M

main(String[]). Static method in class com.icl.saxon.ParserManager
Main program registers the default parser
Usage: java com.icl.saxon.ParserManager parser-class
main(String[]). Static method in class com.icl.saxon.Renderer
Main program
Can be used directly from the command line, format:
java com/icl/saxon/Renderer input-file >output-file
This interface is provided largely for test purposes.
makeParser(). Static method in class com.icl.saxon.ParserManager
Instantiate a SAX parser.
makeParser(String). Static method in class com.icl.saxon.ParserManager
Create a new SAX parser object using the class name provided.
The named class must exist and must implement the org.xml.sax.Parser interface.
This method returns a parser but does not register it as the default parser.

Walk an existing tree, calling registered element handlers as appropriate.
run(InputSource). Method in class com.icl.saxon.Distributor
Run the Distributor, calling element handlers when appropriate.
The SAX parser is obtained by calling ParserManager.
If parsing failures occur, diagnostics are written to the system error output.

setWriter(String, Writer). Method in class com.icl.saxon.Distributor
Set the writer to be used for an element type.
This setting may be overridden for a particular element instance by calling ElementInfo.setWriter() from the element handler.
setWriter(Writer). Method in interface com.icl.saxon.ElementInfo
Set the writer for this element instance.
This affects subsequent output produced for this element instance, and overrides any Writer set for the element type using Distributor.setWriter().
